
=head1 NAME

finding

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - 
 chapter (character varying) - 
 statement (character varying) - 
 ordinal (integer) - 
 report (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                     Table "gcis_metadata.finding"
    Column   |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 ------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  identifier | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  chapter    | character varying |           | extended | 
  statement  | character varying |           | extended | 
  ordinal    | integer           |           | plain    | 
  report     | character varying |           | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "finding_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "finding_chapter_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (chapter) REFERENCES chapter(identifier)
     "finding_report_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (report) REFERENCES report(identifier)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "finding_keyword_map" CONSTRAINT "finding_keyword_map_finding_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (finding) REFERENCES finding(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON finding FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON finding FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
